title: A must-see!
review: A very good film. Tom Hanks gives you the impression that the role is him in real life.

title: One of the best films ever made
review: Watching this film while thinking that Robin Williams is dead makes it far more heartbreaking. 'Oh Captain, my captain'. So authentic, so realistic, so passionate. No words, one of the best films ever made!

title: Amazing!
review: Can't help but give it a 9/10. So heartwarming, with such talented actors! A masterpiece of new times.
